channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More flytipping on Montrave Road and the junction with St Johns Road, 10th August
item.description:
It's getting ridiculous. There's new flytipping every other day. How does this be prevented???

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montrave Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree recently pruned and branches left behind, 10th August
item.description:
The tree on the corner of Fosters Close has recently been pruned but some of the cut branches have been left behind. Please can these be collected.

item.description:

item.title: Large amounts of litter along the whole road, 10th August
item.description:
This matter has been reported numerous times. The whole right side of road as you go up Lodge Hill is covered with unsightly litter, dumped black sacks, bottles, cans etc. it is disgusting. The road is split between London Borough of Bexley and Greenwich council
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lodge Hill, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish and Fly Tipping, 10th August
item.description:
There are items which have been dumped outside of 17 Franklin Place, these include a divan bed/mattress, old fence posts/panels/slats and cardboard/carpet. There has been a habitual problem with poor rubbish disposal at the end of this street, particularly in relation to the HMOs. It would be appreciated if something could be done to remedy the situation. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Franklin Place, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside at the etrance of a dental practice 207 Kilburn High Road, 10th August
item.description:
The pavement is uneven and seems to be sinking, this is right at the entrance of a dental practice where patients old and young have to walk over it to enter the practice; this could be serious hazard and serious accident likely to happen This requires urgent attention.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
